titleStmt.title: The speech of Sr. Edw. Turnor, Kt., speaker of the honourable House of Commons, to the Kings Most Excellent Majesty delivered on Monday the nineteeth day of May, 1662, at the prorogation of the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Turnor, Edward, Sir, 1617-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by D. Maxwell for Henry Twyford, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
